FuncDef: This command configures the Nokia Spanning Tree Protocol (STP) priority for the SAP or spoke-SDP.

ParaDef.Info: The STP priority value for the SAP or spoke-SDP. Allowed values are integer in the range of 0 to 255, 0 being the highest priority. The actual value used for STP priority (and stored in the configuration) will be the result of masking out the lower 4 bits, therefore the actual value range is 0 to 240 in increments of 16.
